body:
Thanks, folks. That sounds really interesting. &, in the interests of 
not re-inventing the wheel, I think I will contact Reinhart next & see 
if he wants a tester.


Although, Grasshopper doesn't yet run on Mac Rhino, hmmm...


Randolph
